[[Computer Joystick|Joystick]] }} [[File:WaterRace ingame 1.png|thumb|left|''WaterRace''{{'}}s Jamaica level.]] '''''WaterRace''''' is a Macintosh computer game developed and released by [[French Touch (company)|French Touch]] in December 2000. It is a boat racing game with 9 levels (or locations) and 9 corresponding boats and characters. ==External links== *[http://www.polhosting.info/web-archives/french-touch/waterrace/index.html ''WaterRace'' homepage (archive)] *[http://www.insidemacgames.com/reviews/view.php?ID=167 ''WaterRace'' review by Inside Mac Games] *[http://www.macosjournal.com/issues/0108/rev.waterrace.shtml ''WaterRace'' review by Mac OS Journal] [[Category:2000 video games]] [[Category:Mac OS-only games]]
